package.description:
This repository contains the Las Vegas Reconstruction Toolskit. We are temporary using this until we reach a stable version and will then create a Debian package that will be uploaded to our own package mirror.
A successful 'rosmake' will eventually create the environment variable $LVR_PATH pointing to this directory.
This issue will be solved by creating a .deb package, meanwhile we just need to accept this... ;-)
package.author: Thomas Wiemann, Henning Deeken, Simon Herkenhoff
